# Seeker (Trait)
## Overview
**Seeker**: You are always on the lookout for reward and danger. You gain a +1 trait bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks, and [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] is always a class skill for you. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
